description: Schema enumerating manual tape measurements and scan landmarks required for SMPL-X fitting.

manual_measurements.name: height
manual_measurements.description: Standing height measured from floor to top of head.

manual_measurements.name: weight
manual_measurements.description: Body mass including clothing worn during scan session.

manual_measurements.name: chest_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Horizontal circumference measured at mid-chest passing through the nipples.

manual_measurements.name: waist_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Horizontal circumference at the narrowest part of the torso above the iliac crest.

manual_measurements.name: hip_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference at the fullest part of the hips and glutes.

manual_measurements.name: neck_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference at the base of the neck passing through the larynx.

manual_measurements.name: shoulder_width
manual_measurements.description: Biacromial shoulder width measured between left and right acromion processes.

manual_measurements.name: arm_length
manual_measurements.description: Distance from the acromion to the wrist along the lateral arm.

manual_measurements.name: inseam_length
manual_measurements.description: Distance from the crotch to the floor along the medial leg.

manual_measurements.name: thigh_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference of the thigh measured 10 cm below the inguinal fold.

manual_measurements.name: calf_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference at the fullest part of the calf.

manual_measurements.name: bicep_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference of the upper arm midway between shoulder and elbow.

manual_measurements.name: wrist_circumference
manual_measurements.description: Circumference measured over the styloid processes.

scan_landmarks.name: head_top
scan_landmarks.description: Vertex of the skull used for global scaling.

scan_landmarks.name: sternum_notch
scan_landmarks.description: Jugular notch at the superior sternum.

scan_landmarks.name: navel
scan_landmarks.description: Center of the navel for anterior torso alignment.

scan_landmarks.name: sacrum
scan_landmarks.description: Posterior pelvis landmark at the sacrum.

scan_landmarks.name: left_acromion
scan_landmarks.description: Left shoulder acromion used for arm pose initialization.

scan_landmarks.name: right_acromion
scan_landmarks.description: Right shoulder acromion used for arm pose initialization.

scan_landmarks.name: left_iliac_crest
scan_landmarks.description: Left iliac crest peak to stabilize pelvic orientation.

scan_landmarks.name: right_iliac_crest
scan_landmarks.description: Right iliac crest peak to stabilize pelvic orientation.

scan_landmarks.name: left_wrist
scan_landmarks.description: Ulnar styloid process for lower arm alignment.

scan_landmarks.name: right_wrist
scan_landmarks.description: Radial styloid process for lower arm alignment.

scan_landmarks.name: left_ankle
scan_landmarks.description: Medial malleolus of the left ankle.

scan_landmarks.name: right_ankle
scan_landmarks.description: Medial malleolus of the right ankle.
